description: Four ingredients and 15 minutes is all you need for this delicious chicken slaw recipe. Using pre-marinated chicken makes this meal super quick and full of flavour.
keywords: Fast Sticky Sweet Chilli Chicken Slaw
name: Fast Sticky Sweet Chilli Chicken Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 375 g Cook sweet chilli lime kebabs

recipeInstructions.text: Top coleslaw mixture with chicken. Scatter over peanuts and reserved crispy noodles. Drizzle over reserved dressing. Serve.
